sequential: Design and Development of Login Button
Integration of Login Button with Authentication Service

questions.question: What is the expected behavior when the login button is clicked?
questions.context: Understanding user interactions and journey stages

questions.question: What visual elements should be included in the design of the login button?
How should the login button behave on different screen sizes?
What accessibility features need to be considered for the login button?
What are the edge cases to consider when interacting with the login button?
How should the login button interact with other components on the page?

epics.title: Design and Development of Login Button
epics.description: This epic involves the design and development of a login button as per the HLR. Since no specific details are provided, the UI developer will use standard design principles and best practices for the development.
epics.business_value: A login button is a critical component for user authentication. It will allow users to access their personal accounts, enhancing user experience and security.
acceptance_criteria: The login button is visible and intuitive
The login button is responsive and works on different screen sizes
The login button is accessible and meets standard accessibility guidelines
assumptions: Users have existing accounts for login

epics.title: Integration of Login Button with Authentication Service
epics.description: This epic involves the integration of the login button with the authentication service. The UI developer will need to ensure that the button triggers the correct service when clicked.
epics.business_value: Integration with the authentication service will ensure that only authorized users can access their accounts, enhancing the security of the platform.
acceptance_criteria: Clicking the login button triggers the authentication service
Successful authentication redirects the user to their account
Failed authentication prompts an error message
assumptions: Authentication service is reliable and secure
